name: Nightmares(Or Watson's Puzzle Adventure!)
description:
Going to sleep after playing your favorite dungeon puzzler game, you find yourself in a place much like the game. What do you do? PUZZLE! Just don't get hurt, or your dream will turn into a Nightmare...

This is my entry for the My First Game Jam Summer 2017.

Controls: PLEASE READ

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.

Space or Z to roll.

R to restart the level.
